nodes.text: Makin was a Mon Calamarian admiral serving the Galactic Alliance during the Second Galactic Civil War. Makin was the commanding officer of the Third Fleet. Like Admiral Cha Niathal, the Supreme Commander of the Galactic Alliance Defense Force, Makin was known to be an aggressive warrior.
Makin commanded the Third Fleet task force at the Second Battle of Fondor and defected to Niathal's faction during the battle.
